The researcher of the Quran is the Almighty: In the creation of the heavens and the earth and the disagreement of the night and the day and the ark that runs in the sea with what the people benefit from and what God has descended from the heavens of the water Its death and broadcast in it from every bear and the winding of winds and clouds that are harnessed between the sky and the earth for the verses of people who are reasonable.Know that he was glorified and exalted when he was judged by the Pardanism and the Duman, the eight of the types of evidence that can be inferred from it, and it is upon it and it is upon it and it is upon it.Its mourning and his opinions from the fading and fad.Second: And before the sympathy in the explanation of the evidence, it is imperative that the two issues: A world of people said: Creation is the creature.And they needed it with the verse and the mind, but the verse is this verse; And that is because he is upset, he said: In the creation of the heavens, the earth, and the difference of night and day to say: There are verses of people who are reasonable and know that the verses are not in the creature; Because the creature is the one who indicates the compulsion, then this verse was indicated that creation is the creature, and the mind has lost it to it: On the departure of something from the numbers to the existence, then this is a matter if it was a matter of destiny and the effect, then it is either that it is an old or a heat, then if it is a valid, then it is a valuable Looking from numbers to existence, and lagging from numbers to existence is preceded by the number, and the eternal is the negative of the preacher, so if the lame in the eternal, the lamean is necessary, and it is necessary for the sake And if it is modern, then it must also be from a way that comes out from the numbers to the presence, then it must have another absurdity, and the words are in it as in the first and the obligation.And the second: It is the highest in the eternal, and it was not a way out of the things from its nods to its existence, then in the eternal, is it the most upset or did it happen?If the most generous thing is the one who is inherited, it is the creature, and if it does not happen, God is the highest, and nothing was created.And the third: that the influence is a lineage between the same influencer and the same effect, and the relative between the two of the two of the two things is that its decision is decreased by the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one It was a height of the sectarianism, even if it was an estimated one from the boundaries of God Almighty, and the arrival of the effect either in the immediate or in the receipt from the boundaries of this righteousness, And the need is necessary, so it is necessary for the effect to be from the boundaries of God Almighty, so God will not be a fierce, and there is no choice, but rather a disturbed refugee, to the effect of the effect, so that the effect is that Displaced, and that is disbelieving.And those who say that the creation is not the creation of the face of it: the first: if they said: be the same (P-26) With the creatures from which the demons, the essence and the dumplings, and that is not a sane person.And the second: If we saw a sharp talk, then he did not happen, then we said: for our saying: It is a mistake, disbelief, and contradictory, so when it is true, it is true.It was that God Almighty created him and did not correct his gestures with his self -esteem.However is the creature.And the third of it: We know the actions of worshipers and know God Almighty and His ability with that we do not know that the influencer in the actions of worshipers is the best of God What is knowledgeable, the influence of the ability to be able to fall into the fate of the fate is a stimulant for the same thing that is destiny and for the same destiny, then this is the one who is the blackness and the creation of the white, the creation of the jewel and the creation of the offer, so the trap of creation is one thing in all of the stimulants of this The disagreement, with the same third question: This verse indicated that it is necessary to be taken over the existence of the goods with the mental signs, and that the conversion is not to do so Gross.* * * The following question: they said: Talk to us about what Moses brought you from the verses.So they spoke to them with the stick and the white of the white, and they asked the Christians about that, and they spoke to them it was said that it was said: Liability; Because what is the movement of the movement requires the precedence otherwise; Because the movement is transferred from one state to a state, and the eternity said: Rather, we say: He descends from the sky as God Almighty mentioned it while he is the truthful in his news, and if he is able to hold the water in the clouds, then what is the distance of it, after its death [Al -Jathiya: 5], know that this life is from the flaws: one of them: the appearance of the plant, which is the whole and the grass of what is not.Long live the animals of the earth.And the second: that if it was if the tools were obtained for worshipers.And the third of it: It is an alert that all things are alerted; Because it is the Heavy Handbron, with his saying: There is no bear in the earth except God, their sustenance [Hood: 6].And the one who is seen: that there is in it from the colors, the food, and the narratives, and what is reconciled to the dressing; life after the death is metaphor; Because life is only valid for those who realize and correct to know, as well as death, except that the body if it becomes alive in which there are types of goodness, there is no one in that Sayer of the tales.As for the human being, who is indicative of his concession in his resurrection to the artists ’faces: one of them: it is narrated that one said when Omar ibn al -Khattab, may God be pleased with him: Al-Shattraj, because his patch is a arm in a arm, and if (P-180), the human playing is a thousand thousand times, because it does not agree two times on one side.And Omar ibn al -Khattab said: We are what is more impressive than it, which is that the destination of the face is a liver in a young man, then the position of the members in which the two captives, the two of the two, and the one who is not, and the people, and the two, The bit, then you do not see two people in the honesty and the western It has no limit.And the second: that the human matter in this installation that the family of the doctor said: The highest Applications must be the fire; Because it is a spicy hot, and it is written from it in the kindness, then the water is, and able, and about the water so that it does not erase it, and from the air so that it does not remove its troops and its sins, and from the fire, it is not that it is burned, then it is a slander, and
